Title: Requires the department of education create an online database of seats available for non-public and public institutions who offer college opportunity programs
Summary: Requires the department of education create an online database of seats available for non-public and public institutions who offer college opportunity programs and provide such information to authorized high school counselors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the department of education to create a database tracking college opportunity program seats at non-public and public institutions
